eu.eexcess.insa.peas

Class QueryEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.eexcess.insa.peas.QueryEngine

  • public class QueryEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Three formats of queries are handled in this component (see QueryFormats): QF1, QF2 and QF3. Three formats of results are handled in this component:
    • RF1: represents a result of the form r = [r1, r2, r3]. This format is the one returned by the federated recommender.
    • RF2: represents a result of the form r = [[r1, r2, r3], [r4, r5, r6], [r7, r8, r9]].
    • RF3: represents a result of the form r = [R1, R2, R3]. Each R is the detailed information of a resoruce.
    Queries of format QF1, QF2 and QF3 respectively return a result of format RF1, RF2 and RF3.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Thomas Cerqueus
    See Also:
    QueryFormats

      • alterQuery

        public org.json.JSONObject alterQuery(java.lang.String origin,
                             org.json.JSONObject query)
        Alters the query to generate a query identifier (if needed), to remove the user identifier, and to remove the origin.
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin of the query.
        query - Query of format QF1 or QF2.
        Returns:
        A query (QF1 or QF2).

      • isObfuscatedQuery

        public java.lang.Boolean isObfuscatedQuery(org.json.JSONObject query)
        Determines if the query is obfuscated (format QF2) or not (QF1).
        Parameters:
        query - A query.
        Returns:
        true if the format of query is QF1; false otherwise.

      • processQuery

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response processQuery(java.lang.String origin,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                     org.json.JSONObject query,
                                     QueryFormats type)
        Processes a query of format QF1, QF2 or QF3.
        Parameters:
        origin - Origin of the query.
        req - HTTP request.
        query - Any type of query: QF1, QF2, or details query.
        type - Type of the query to be processed
        Returns:
        Result of format RF1, RF2 or RF3 (depending on the format of the query).
